recommended_degree: Ilmu Kesehatan Masyarakat, Teknik Lingkungan, Keselamatan dan Kesehatan Kerja, Keselamatan Kerja & Pencegahan Kebakaran, Sanitasi Lingkungan (Sarjana)
job_description:
Join us as a Health Safety Environment (HSE) Intern to maintain a safe workplace and strengthening emergency preparedness. Your responsibilities will include:

1. Assisting in firefighting operations, including the use of fire extinguishers, fire balls, and hose reels.
2. Supporting the supervised operation of the fire truck during emergency drills or HSE activities.
3. Helping the HSE team conduct fire-related risk assessments and participate in Job Safety Analysis (JSA).
4. Performing daily fire safety patrols across factory premises to identify hazards and ensure compliance with safety standards.
5. Preparing fire safety reports, and assisting GA/HSE in developing training materials, procedures, and standard operating documents.

This position is ideal for graduates who are interested in occupational safety, emergency response, and gaining hands-on experience in industrial fire safety management.
